bow: thoughts on fur mommies posting more for validation than anything but is anyone else annoyed when fur mommies wish themselves happy mothers day feel like it would be similar to me wishing myself happy nurse day because ve always wanted to be nurse but for multitude of reasons could or would go through with getting license as someone who does have mom to celebrate on mother day amp who is mom re shift my focus to include all types of care have friends who have chosen to not have kids who have tried and failed to have kids who have lost their kids etc but who are just as mom like in many ways to me and moms with kids if it makes them happy all for it it does hurt anyone this day is hard for many people for many reasons who am to turn down any celebration of love and care as it makes sense in everyone life be more offended with some telling me should celebrate my mom bc it mother day even though she abused me for 25+ years rather celebrate fur baby moms any day over that so if they re celebrating care and love see no issues ll add too if you ve ever nursed anyone like been there for dying relative etc as care giver then think nurse day would apply to you too license or not thank you for putting it that way it makes sense that way do agree but get what you mean lol it just my perspective happy it helps do totally get the annoyance and you re totally entitled to however you feel there is no right or wrong happy to offer different way of looking at it this day is hard for people like me and appreciate your openness haha fair enough guess have broad views on things lol sorry it hard for you do have to much issue with happy mother day to fur babies other than just rolling my eyes and moving on as long as they do try to say the pets are the same amount of work and emotional investment then they re ok thanks it gets little bit easier every year since ve cut them out of my life thankfully have an amazing kid and husband to focus on need to learn this rolling my eyes and moving on you speak of this is exactly how feel share the love that exactly what do think it ridiculous but whatever have to admit that have been getting annoyed with this on facebook as well it my first mother day and do love the hallmark holiday concept but getting to appreciate how much physical and emotional work it is to be mother feel little invalidated by pet parents celebrating mother day someone know even got mother day gift she has cat maybe it because motherhood is still so new for me so it still incredibly challenging appreciated my family recognizing the work that have put into being parent it so much more than having dog or cat or anything but that my personal opinion opinion it buuuuuullshit when all your friends tell you happy mother day but you re own family or in law ca be bothered too and your sister spends all day telling facebook dog moms are moms too and people are telling her happy mother day then say wtf agree about including all care in mother day because mom is code for caregiver on somewhat related note had friend who normally strongly agree with all the time say happy mothers day to the women who chose not to have kids but instead honor the earth by not having offspring rubbed me really wrong was reeeeaallllyyy close to hitting that unfriend button worse than you not only am getting annoyed at the fur baby moms getting irritated at people congratulating me for my first mother day while also congratulating my sister in law who still pregnant with her first was pregnant last mother day why did that not count if hers does very silly today yes exactly mothers are special because not everyone can be mother sorry not sorry everyone should not be getting trophy today that sad wow havent heard that one yet wtf is that what the point even at that point haha hear you but it our day we can be silly if we want honestly we have pets and an month old we fiercely love our baby but we also love our pets with the same intensity just in different ways think it totally valid to call oneself fur mommy and think it silly to say that only human mother are allowed to be proud of and recognize the care they give on mother day also you never know someone situation maybe they re infertile and have pets to fill that void of not being able to have children or maybe they never wanted kids but still want to nurture and care for something and receive affection in return just think it weird to say mothers day is only for mothers of humans we re all people and we all need to feel needed and loved that is all edit do understand the annoyance of the facebook posts thing though but the oversharing look at me attitude is just from fur moms think it can come from anyone dunno you tell me lol http imgur com kfpgsmg jpg it is have no and back for their kids when can just leave my fur baby at home and go do what want yeah you pick up poop puke nurse them back to health snuggle but do think some people like my sister get that dogs are heck of lot different than humans get snapchat every morning of her kid he plays catch with dad or is snuggling with mom my kid has mild cp and scoliosis so when she tries to tell me *her* kid is just like *my* kid yeah there are no words lol my kid was in the nicu the first 55 days of her life see my fur mommy friends go to clubs and parties and movies every weekend they have vacations yeah yadda but why even call it mother day if it let celebrate everyone who thinks they re mother but might not actually be mother day is there fur mommy day if not maybe someone should start it so it does degrade actual mothers removed got downvoted on another sub for saying my opinion that if you have only pets and no kids you re not parent it drives me bonkers when people think their pets are their children edit understand that pet ownership comes with its own set of issues challenges and hardships but suffered through miserable pregnancy and section and recovery from said section other mamas go through even worse pregnancies and deliveries other people struggle for years to have children or spend years trying to adopt and sorry but owning and caring for dog or cat just is on that level and it does give you automatic inclusion in mothers day was there helping to birth my fur boys bottle fed them when their mom could feed them watched them open their eyes and was up doing feedings throughout the night helped them learn to walk be able to go up and down stairs worried about their health when something was wrong and even when it was ok taught them manners and how to behave ve had fur kids and ve had human kids and honestly in the first few weeks there was much difference in the level of care that they needed those boys are mine no more or less than my daughter is ve been lucky to have them and to watch them grow just like ve been lucky to have my daughter and to watch her grow ve been wished happy mothers day for them and frankly deserved it was there caregiver and without me or another human they would not have survived my case is bit different because ve been there for every part of their lives but *am* their mom did damn good job of raising them did pawn them off because they were planned took care of them and love them the only difference see is that unfortunately they will only be here for small period of my life but the time will be joyous wo have to send them to college but they also wo be able to take care of me when older ve raised their father ve raised them and if lucky ll get to raise their kids would trade either kinds of my kids for anything in
